item.title: Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! launches July 31 for PS4, Xbox Series, and Switch in Japan, later for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Detective adventure game dated.

Detective adventure game Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! will launch digitally for PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, and Switch on July 31 in Japan for 2,970 yen, followed by PC via Steam at a later date, MAGES. announced.

Mystereet: Yasogami Kaoru no Chousen! is a port of the original Mystereet, which was first released on PC as Mystereet: Fukagyaku Sekai no Tantei Shishi in 2004, and has since been ported to PlayStation 2 as Mystereet: Yasogamo Kaoru no Jiken File and PlayStation Portable as Mystereet Portable: Yasogamo Kaoru no Chousen!. The PlayStation Portable version, which included a collection of mini scenarios called “Kaoru Yasogami’s Case Files,” was also re-ported to PC as Mystereet Windows: Yasogamo Kaoru no Chousen!. It is also likely the basis for this new port.
